document_data.name: Intellect Fortress
document_data.mainbody: '''''Intellect fortress''''' was a [[psionic]] devotion of the [[telepathy]] [[discipline]] that allowed the [[psionicist]] to envelop their mind in protective psychic energy.
document_data.Effects: An ''intellect fortress'' excelled at protecting the mind against an ''[[ego whip]]'' attack but was susceptible to a ''[[psionic blast]]''.

Notable Users.Individuals: * [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
